title: Jing Lian Zhai - Xizhimen
description: Located near a Buddhist temple, and the restaurant's interior has a refined and tranquil literary atmosphere. Famous for their imperial cuisine, "Spring River Water". Name in Chinese: 静莲斋 Chinese Address: 高粱桥斜街甲30号梅苑饭店1-2楼. Previously named Still Thoughts.
streetAddress: Meiyuan Hotel, No. 30, Gaoliangqiao St., 1st-2nd floor
